items.sentence: She is one of the best ballerinas in the world.
The only thing Tom ever talks about is his job.
The people in the auditorium were pretty quiet.
The police ordered the suspect to drop his gun.
The police planted evidence at the crime scene.
The police said they were going to release Tom.
Tom can do that better than anyone else I know.
Tom can no longer be a member of our committee.
Tom can play both tennis and table tennis well.
I think something terrible has happened to Tom.
